author: Khadeeja Safdar
title: The Stores That Track Your Returns
text:
More consumers are finding out that stores are using a third-party service to monitor their shopping behavior and limit the amount of merchandise they can return.

Best Buy Co. has been the target of a large share of consumer complaints on Facebook, Twitter, Yelp and other online forums about its efforts to police returns with the help of a firm called Retail Equation.
